column1: Little Goat Diner////I tried the Breakfast Spaghetti 'n clams 'n crab. This is quite an interesting dish! I did not expect it to come out the way that it did. So the eggs are cooked like an omelet on top of the noodles
column2: and it's steeped in clam soup. It's like spaghetti with eggs in clam soup
column4: clam and pork guanciale on top. The flavros worked well together and I'm glad I got to try it! Very unique and different.
